pkgmetadata.longdescription:
trimpolya - a very simple tool for identifying and annotating poly-A tails and trimming following sequence.
Usage: trimpolya input.fasta input.qual
Detailed description of the method is at <http://blog.malde.org/index.php/2009/12/14/searching-for-polya-tails/>, darcs repository is at <http://malde.org/~ketil/biohaskell/trimpolya>.
